name: Two Senses
description:
A visual novel about a man with only two senses. This was created as part of the United Game Jam 2, which had a theme of, well, two!

Controls:

Click or Spacebar to move forward.

That's it!

Notes:

Yes, I am aware of the screen size issue. I don't have time to fix that for the jams deadline, but expect an update soon to fix it. It shouldn't detract from the game itself. 

There is currently no feature to save the game, or to speed up text. This should be included in the next update. This is not a particularly long VN, so I hope you can enjoy it without that.

There is no main menu. When you start the game, you start the game! This will be fixed in the update.

Options to change text speed and size will be added in a future update. 

Please leave comments and questions down below! Would you like a continuation of this story?
